getDefaultTheme

#### Description

Get the default theme for styling a pivot table.

#### Usage
<pre><code>

getDefaultTheme(parentPivot, themeName = "default")

</code></pre>
#### Arguments

parentPivot Owning pivot table.
themeName The name to use as the new theme name.
Value
A PivotStyles object.10
